## Intro {style="color: #25D366;"}
:::

As part of a team of two other data enthusiast, I came up with a solution to address the abysmal performance of secondary school students in the UTME exams in recent years.

You can read about the project here:

```{=html}
<iframe width="100%" height="500px" src="https://starlight-academy-landing.onrender.com"></iframe> <a href="https:&#x2F;&#x2F;www.canva.com&#x2F;design&#x2F;DAGTCJT5DYY&#x2F;_9vyyZLnaiFYO5Ub3V7yug&#x2F;view?utm_content=DAGTCJT5DYY&amp;utm_campaign=designshare&amp;utm_medium=embeds&amp;utm_source=link" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Starlight DataFest 24</a> by Edun Joshua, Makinde Kayode & Mbuotidem Awak
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I was in charge of designing a web app called Starlight, an school management system solution with a novel feature: a machine learning enabled pipeline that identifies at-risk student and displays it on the app for admins to view.

You can view the app [here](https://starlight-academy-landing.onrender.com/ "Starlight")
